query.statement:
SELECT X2.POSID_1 AS POSID , X1.LIFNR , X3.NAME1 , X3.TEMNO AS TMCD , X3.NAMET , X3.PERNO , X3.NAMEE , X3.POSIT AS POSIT1 , CASE WHEN X3.POSIT = 'X' THEN '' ELSE 'X' END AS POSIT2 , '등록' AS GUBUN , X3.ENTER , X3.BIRTH , CASE WHEN X3.BIRTH <> '19000000' AND X3.BIRTH <> '19700090' THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(256, CHAR(TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE) - TIMESTAMP_FORMAT(X3.BIRTH, 'YYYYMMDD'))) ELSE '' END AS AGE , X3.CDATE , L2.ACTSS_NM AS ACTSS_NM_CORP , X3.ACTSS AS ACTSS_GAEIN , L1.ACTSS_NM AS ACTSS_NM_GAEIN , X1.TUIP_CHKA , X1.TUIP_CHKB , CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(64, CHAR(TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE) - TIMESTAMP_FORMAT(X3.CDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))) < 12 THEN '0.' || TIMESTAMPDIFF(64, CHAR(TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE) - TIMESTAMP_FORMAT(X3.CDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))) ELSE DEC((TIMESTAMPDIFF(64, CHAR(TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE) - TIMESTAMP_FORMAT(X3.CDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')))) / 12.0, 8, 1) END AS CAREAR , X3.POSIC , X3.RETID FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0301 AS X1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0001 AS X3 ON X3.MANDT = X1.MANDT AND X3.LIFNR = X1.LIFNR AND X3.PERNO = X1.PERNO AND X3.GBN = 'A' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW0302 AS X4 ON X4.MANDT = X1.MANDT AND X4.INP_DT = X1.INP_DT AND X4.LIFNR = X1.LIFNR AND X4.PERNO = X1.PERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS X2 ON X4.MANDT = X2.MANDT AND X4.PSPID = X2.POSID AND X4.POSID = X2.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS L ON L.MANDT = X1.MANDT AND L.LIFNR = X1.LIFNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0000 AS L1 ON L1.MANDT = X3.MANDT AND L1.ACTSS = X3.ACTSS LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0000 AS L2 ON L2.MANDT = L.MANDT AND L2.ACTSS = L.ACTSS WHERE X1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X1.INP_DT = #INP_DT# AND X1.TUIP_CHKA = 'X' AND SUBSTR(X1.PERNO,1,1) = 'S' AND X3.ACTSS <> X2.ZZACTSS AND X3.RETIF <> 'X'
AND X3.ACTSS IN ('21','10','08')
AND X3.ACTSS IN ('02','19','20')
AND X3.ACTSS IN ('06','05','07','12')
AND X3.ACTSS IN ('03','04','11','09')
AND X3.ACTSS IN ('13','01')
AND X3.ACTSS IN ('14')
AND X2.ZZACTSS <> #ZZACTSS# AND X3.ACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
ORDER BY X3.ACTSS, X1.LIFNR, X1.PERNO FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
